mapper.select: select * from orders where customer_id = #{userId} limit #{offset},#{size}
mapper.update: update orders set status = #{status} where id = #{orderId}
mapper.insert: insert into orders(customer_id, merchant_id, orderTime, status, total) values(#{userId}, #{merchantId}, #{orderTime}, #{status}, #{total})
mapper.select: select * from orders where create_time between #{startDate} AND #{endDate}
